item.title: Your Chance to Invent Payphone 2.0
item.description:
Remember payphones? Before cellphones, they were everywhere, especially in busy areas. Now that everyone has a cellphone, you might think payphones are gone, like horses and buggies. Not quite. Public payphones are still important for communication. Think about Hurricane Sandy: cell towers failed, and people desperately needed to communicate. VoIP and broadband were also down. Surprisingly, old payphones still worked. You could just insert coins and make a call. Why did old technology work when modern technology failed?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/your-chance-to-invent-payphone-20/
